chap

noun:

(informal) a man or boy; fellow; gentleman

away

adverb:

to or at a distance from a particular place or person.

What we're about

We provide classic, authentic, quality travel items from a by-gone era.

Travelling away from home could be anything from a quick Sunday walk around your estate, through to circumnavigating the globe!

We aim to supply anything that you might need for such adventures away from home, from a waterproof canvas bag to a gentlemans wash kit.

We at Chaps Away are tired of modern materials that are not built to last. We source vintage items that not only look amazing but are robust and functional.

Oliver and Neil

Our Officers Wash Roll

A true Gentleman's Wash Roll to neatly place all the essential items a Gentleman may take with him. At Chaps Away we are tired of wash bags and loose shaving kits. We have designed a true gentleman's Wash Roll to neatly place all the essential items a gentleman may take with him. Hand made in the Cotswolds using 100% natural cotton.
